resources.string: Welcome, Administrator. \n Please create Your login
Please create Your password and remember it
Control question if You loose Your password. \n Enter some question that you know the answer to
What time does your shift start today?
Your shift starts in 23:00,\nTODAY 19 of OCTOBER
Your shift STARTS TODAY on 19 of OCTOBER, in 23:00 \n and FINISHES in 23:00,TOMORROW 20 of OCTOBER
UNITE ALL CURRENT DATAS \n WITH CLOUD DATA BASE
Time to answer\n During this time the guard must to react on application\'s request in a form of blinking screen.He has to touch the screen during this time
Requests quantity\n Set the number of checks.
Sound signal\n Switch on the signal in case of absence of guard\'s response
Pause\n Pause the application in case the guard temporarily has to leave the security checkpoint
Blocking\n If this option is switched on then the button HOME and BACK will be blocked
Time to answer\n During this time the guard must to response on application\'s request in a form of blinking screen.He has to touch the screen during this time
REQUESTS FREQUENCY\n Set the number of checks per hour.
SOUND SIGNAL\n Switch on/off the signal in case of absence of guard\'s response
PAUSE\n Pause the application in case the guard temporarily has to leave the security checkpoint
BLOCKING\n If this option is switched on then the button HOME and BACK will be blocked
